Class Board

extends Object
    The Board class creates a playing board for the game of War

      • gameWinner

        public int gameWinner()
        gameWinner method determines if someone has won the game, and if so, who won
        Returns:
        int gameWinner 0 if no winner yet, 1 if playerOne won, 2 if playerTwo won, 3 if tie

      • roundWinner

        public int roundWinner()
        winner method determines the winner of that round
        Returns:
        int Winner 0 if tie, 1 if playerOne won, 2 if playerTwo won

      • roundWinnerToString

        public String roundWinnerToString()
        winnerToString method
